text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo Odd how all the riot police have PPE to fight peaceful protesters but nurses and doctors don't have what they need to fight the coronavirus.  How did that happen, #BunkerBoy?  Please don't tell me you're trying -- once again -- to distract, deflect, and lie.  Of course you are.
